item.title: Spotify API Fun Vol 1: Similarity in Music Preference Networks across Platforms
item.description: I decided to start my blog off with a short series I’m calling spotify api fun. In it, I’ll be sharing some things I’ve learned while exploring data from Spotify’s API. In this post, I’ll be combining data from Spotify’s and Twitter’s APIs to investigate the extent to which music preferences are expressed similarly across the two platforms. I’ll be looking at The Grateful Dead’s Recommendation Network and the extent to which the artists artists in that network have followers in common on Twitter.
